subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Angels released reliever Edwar Ramírez, not once, but twice. This season, Ramírez has emerged as an intriguing part of the Yankees’ revitalized bullpen.
snippet: The Angels released reliever Edwar Ramírez, not once, but twice. This season, Ramírez has emerged as an intriguing part of the Yankees’ revitalized bullpen.
